name: Relic Hunter (K I N G)
description:
You are an ancient Relic Hunter escaping a deep mysterious tomb. Climb Teleport and Catapult your way to FREEDOM! Use the relics you have discovered to find a way out!
Genre: Foddian

Game Length: Depends if you're a pro gamer...

Controls (All Controls In Game)

A - D 
Move Left and Right

Spacebar 
Jump

1, 2, 3 Key (Ability Fast Use)
Sometimes you have to be quick with abilities so the numbers are mapped to the corresponding abilities below.

Mouse
The mouse is used to rotate which way your ability is fired.

Left Mouse Click or E
Use active ability.

Q or Right Click
Filter through abilities and Cancel active ability.

TAB
Tab will open the settings menu to adjust volume, reset game, and see controls.

Abilities

Boomerang (1) - Use the boomerang as a source of light to help you find the right way and increase your field of view.

Teleport Stick (2) - Use the teleport stick to get across large gaps and big jumps.

Blackhole (3) - The Blackhole is used to fling yourself with the catapult.
